Name: PvZ2_Preprelease_LC_P1

Updates.en: Added A.K.E.E., Endurian, Gold Leaf, Lava Guava, Toadstool
Updates.zh: 加入AKEE、榴莲、黄金叶、岩浆番石榴、金蟾菇

Updates.en: Added Lost Pilot, Excavator, Parasol, Bug, Imp Porter, Turquoise Skull Zombie
Updates.zh: 加入坠落飞行员、洛阳铲、洋伞、蜻蜓、搬运工小鬼、青骷髅头僵尸
加入失落之城世界地图

Updates.en: Added Gold Tile and Trap Tiles
Updates.zh: 加入黄金地砖和陷阱地砖

Updates.en: Some plants in Store are hidden before players get through 'Demonstration Levels' for them. For Example, Egypt 28 for Snow Pea
Updates.zh: 一些商店购买的植物在打通对应的“展示关卡”之前会被隐藏。例如，通关埃及28才能购买寒冰射手

NewFeatures: 加入AKEE、榴莲、黄金叶、岩浆番石榴、金蟾菇
加入坠落飞行员、洛阳铲、洋伞、蜻蜓、搬运工小鬼、青骷髅头僵尸
加入失落之城世界地图
加入黄金地砖和陷阱地砖
一些商店购买的植物在打通对应的“展示关卡”之前会被隐藏。例如，通关埃及28才能购买寒冰射手
EnNewFeatures: Added A.K.E.E., Endurian, Gold Leaf, Lava Guava, Toadstool
Added Lost Pilot, Excavator, Parasol, Bug, Imp Porter, Turquoise Skull Zombie
Added Gold Tile and Trap Tiles
Some plants in Store are hidden before players get through 'Demonstration Levels' for them. For Example, Egypt 28 for Snow Pea
